@description.name: @description
@description.body:
The picker widget gives the user the possibility to select a value out of an array of values. The picker widget can be added to a {@link qx.ui.mobile.dialog.Popup} or to any other container. The picker widget is able to display multiple picker slots, for letting the user choose several values at one time, in one single control. You can add an array with objects which contain the keys title, a subtitle or an image (all optional). 

 var picker = new qx.ui.mobile.control.Picker();
 picker.setHeight(200);
 picker.addListener("changeSelection", function(evt) {
   var data = evt.getData();
 },this);
 var slotData1 = [{title:"Windows Phone"}, {title:"iOS",subtitle:"Version 7.1"}, {title:"Android"}];
 var slotData2 = [{title:"Tablet"}, {title:"Smartphone"}, {title:"Phablet"}];
 picker.addSlot(new qx.data.Array(slotData1));
 picker.addSlot(new qx.data.Array(slotData2));

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fired when the selection of a slot has changed. Example: { index: 0, item: [Object], slot: 0 }

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Controls how much visible items are shown inside the picker.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Controls the picker height.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The owning object

@description.name: @description
@description.body: {String} The ID of the object.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Handler for appear event of this widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the internal used picker model which contains one or more picker slot models.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Creates a picker slot.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: slotIndex {Number} the index of this slot.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: delegate {qx.ui.mobile.list.IListDelegate?null} the list delegate object for this slot list.
@param.description: the list delegate object for this slot list.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {qx.ui.mobile.container.Scroll} the picker slot as a scroll container.
@return.description: the picker slot as a scroll container.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Creates a placeholder list item, for making sure the selected item is vertically centered.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Calculates the item height of a picker item.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Handler for changeSelection event on picker list.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Handler for waypoint event on scroll container.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Getter for the selectedIndex of a picker slot, identified by its index.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: slotIndex {Integer} the index of the target picker slot.
@param.description: the index of the target picker slot.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Integer} the index of the target picker slot, or null if slotIndex is unknown.
@return.description: the index of the target picker slot, or null if slotIndex is unknown.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Setter for the selectedIndex of a picker slot, identified by its index.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: slotIndex {Integer} the index of the target picker slot.
@param.description: the index of the target picker slot.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: selectedIndex {Integer} the selectedIndex of the slot.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the picker slot count, added to this picker.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Adds an picker slot to the end of the array.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: slotModel {qx.data.Array} the picker slot model to display.
@param.description: the picker slot model to display.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: delegate {qx.ui.mobile.list.IListDelegate?null} the list delegate object for this slot.
@param.description: the list delegate object for this slot.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Removes the picker slot at the given slotIndex.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: slotIndex {Integer} the index of the target picker slot.
@param.description: the index of the target picker slot.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Handles the changeBubble and event on a picker slot model.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property qxOwner. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.
